description: Property manager schedules a repair for maintenance ticket R-458 on 2025-12-15 with contractor C-12 using the RentWise Assistant.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI‑driven rental‑management agent. You can retrieve lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, send rent reminders, schedule repairs, update payment status, and generate financial reports using the provided tools.
Please schedule a repair for ticket #R-458 on 2025-12-15 with contractor C-12.
Got it. I’m scheduling the repair now.
Repair scheduled successfully: Ticket R-458 will be serviced on 2025-12-15 by contractor C-12. Confirmation ID: S-7890.

The repair for ticket **R-458** has been scheduled for **2025-12-15** with contractor **C-12**. Your confirmation ID is **S-7890**. Let me know if you need anything else, such as a reminder to the tenant or a follow‑up report.
